subject: Meeting at 3
content: 1. The display has rounded corners that follow a beautiful curved design, and these corners are within a standard rectangle. When measured as a standard rectangular shape, the screen is 15.40 centimetres / 6.06 inches (iPhone 14) or 16.95 centimetres / 6.68 inches (iPhone 14 Plus) diagonally. Actual viewable area is less.
